articles.author: Piyali Bhadra
articles.title: Alia Bhatt to Isha Ambani: South Asian stars who stunned at Met Gala - The Times of India
articles.description: Let's take a look at all the Met Gala 2024 looks of South Asian stars.
articles.content: The first Monday in May marked the arrival of the popular Met Gala event in the city of New York. This year, there were several South Asian stars who arrived at the iconic stairs of the Met in style.… [+17 chars]
